code: import axios from"axios";export function setToken(token){localStorage.setItem('token',token);}export function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem('token');}export function deleteToken(){localStorage.removeItem('token');}export function initAxiosIntterceptos(){axios.interceptors.request.use(function(config){var token=getToken();if(token){config.headers.authorization=token;return config;}else{return config;}});}
